actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title XII of the National Housing Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to require that at least one-third of the voting members of every board of directors or other advisory boards of State plans to assure fair access to insurance shall not be employed by, or otherwise affiliated with, insurers, agents, or other entities of the insurance industry.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XII of the National Housing Act.
